events.message: The insured reported that their vehicle was involved in a collision at an intersection, triggering the need to file a claim promptly.
After initial review, the claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the keywords indicating a car collision incident.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the case to ensure the customer receives timely updates and assistance throughout the process.
The claim has been officially acknowledged by the insurance company, confirming receipt and initiation of processing steps.
The claims agent requested the accident report, vehicle damage photos, and a police report to verify the details of the incident.
The insured has submitted all the requested documents including accident report, photos of damage, and a copy of the police report.
The investigation team began assessing the submitted materials and scheduling an on-site inspection to evaluate vehicle damage.
The vehicle inspection and document review were completed successfully with findings supporting the claim validity.
Based on investigation results, a settlement amount was proposed to cover repairs and related expenses, awaiting customer review.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement offer and expressed appreciation for the efficient handling.
The claim was formally approved following customer acceptance of the settlement proposal and verification of all paperwork.
Payment for the approved settlement amount has been processed and sent to the insured's designated bank account promptly.
The claim was officially closed after payment issuance and final confirmation that all obligations have been fulfilled.
